page.title: 09EVENTS IN CRANHAM
page.content: Some headlines from our local papers: Terror drugged knife fiend, Gunman steals Â£5000, Death at bus stop. One story concerned cruelty to a horse:Blind cruelty _ Cruel snipers fired an airgun pellet into a horse's eye at the weekend. A pleasanter story was:Appeal for a queen:"An SOS is being sent out by Cranham Carnival Association to all girls over 15. A selection dance is being held at Hall Mead School and interested girls should contact..." Finally a news story concerning our schools:Kids hit by new strikes; "Havering schoolchildren are the targets of two_way teacher union action aimed at causing major disruption in the borough's schools.
